Roles:
    -Student
        *Reserve a classroom
        *View inside Classrooms
        *See Reserved Classess
        *Filter and Search Classrooms
        *Report To IT
        *Show Classroom Information
        *View Exam Schedule
        *View Course Schedules
        *Chat for each classroom
        *Read News
        *Attending club events
        *Open Map
    -Teacher
        *Reserve a classroom
        *View inside Classrooms
        *See Reserved Classess
        *Filter and Search Classrooms
        *Report To IT
        *Create Announcements
        *Show Classroom Information
        *View Exam Schedule
        *View Course Schedules
        *Chat for each classroom
    -Admin
        *See, Edit or Delete Users
        *See, Edit or Delete Reservations
        *See, Edit or Delete IT Reports
        *See User Statistics
        *See Reservation Statistics
        *See Statistics of IT Reports
        *Create News
        *View Inside Of Classrooms
        *View Exam Schedules
        *View Course Schedules
    -IT Staff
        *Open IT Problems
        *Filter and Search Classrooms
        *View Inside Of Classrooms
        *Show Classroom Information
